name: Climb, Kitty!
description:
Climb, Kitty! is a low stakes cozy platformer about a cat and their human! Relax while running, jumping and, most importantly, meowing. Created during the Rainbow Game Jam 2021 for the theme "Liberation".

Controls:
A/D - move left/right
Spacebar - jump
LMB - progress dialogue
E - meow!
ESC - open main menu

Credits

Design, programming, writing by Anthony O

Assets
Cat sprites by SeethignSwarm
Human sprites by Legnops
Ruins tileset (Amarelo) by Adam Saltsman
Trees/rocks/additional nature assets by aamatniekss
Boxes/signs/additional assets by aamatniekss
Clouds by LateNightCoffee

Sound
Moonlight Lullaby (BG music) by VOiD1 Gaming
Cat SFX by freesfx.co.uk

Dialogue system by Not Yet
